Name: KaveXplorer
About the game: KaveXplorer is a top-down bullet hell dungeon crawler following a group of Xplorers seeking for the universe crystal. Select your hero, defeat monsters, learn new abilities, get cursed, fate, and repeat until you survive the challenging series of floors and defeat the ultimate monster. The Kave: A magical cave that changes its structures every time you enter. With thousands of monsters and tons of secrets. The deeper you go, the crazier the challenge but the greater the reward. The Xplorers: Choose one of four Xplorers. Each with their own abilities, racing for the ultimate treasure of the Kave. FEATURES: Xplore the Kave as 4 playable Xplorers each with 21 unique abilities. Xplore 3 stages of challenging procedurally generated dungeons with different enemies and shrines. Support keyboard and mouse. Vibrant pixel art with a mysterious playing environment. Unlock 16 achievements.
